    • Method Detail

      • gauss

        public static final double gauss​(double x,
                                 double sigma,
                                 double c)
        gaussian membership function
        Parameters:
        x - input value for which to compute membership value.
        sigma - is the standard deviation.
        c - is the mean.
        Returns:
        membership value.

      • gauss2

        public static final double gauss2​(double x,
                                  double sigma1,
                                  double c1,
                                  double sigma2,
                                  double c2)
        gaussian combination membership function
        Parameters:
        x - input value for which to compute membership value.
        sigma1 - is the standard deviation of the left gaussian function.
        c1 - is the mean of the left gaussian function.
        sigma2 - is the standard deviation of the right gaussian function.
        c2 - is the mean of the right gaussian function.
        Returns:
        membership value.

      • gbell

        public static final double gbell​(double x,
                                 double a,
                                 double b,
                                 double c)
        generalized bell-shaped membership function
        Parameters:
        x - input value for which to compute membership value.
        a - defines the width of the membership function, where a larger value creates a wider membership function.
        b - defines the shape of the curve on either side of the central plateau, where a larger value creates a more steep transition.
        c - defines the center of the membership function.
        Returns:
        membership value.

      • sig

        public static final double sig​(double x,
                               double a,
                               double c)
        sigmoidal membership function
        Parameters:
        x - input value for which to compute membership value.
        a - defines the width of the transition area.
        c - defines the center of the transition area.
        Returns:
        membership value.

      • dsig

        public static final double dsig​(double x,
                                double a1,
                                double c1,
                                double a2,
                                double c2)
        difference between two sigmoidal membership functions
        Parameters:
        x - input value for which to compute membership value.
        a1 - defines the width of the first transition area.
        c1 - defines the center of the first transition area.
        a2 - defines the width of the second transition area.
        c2 - defines the center of the second transition area.
        Returns:
        membership value.

        public static final double psig​(double x,
                                double a1,
                                double c1,
                                double a2,
                                double c2)
        product of two sigmoidal membership functions
        Parameters:
        x - input value for which to compute membership value.
        a1 - defines the width of the first transition area.
        c1 - defines the center of the first transition area.
        a2 - defines the width of the second transition area.
        c2 - defines the center of the second transition area.
        Returns:
        membership value.

      • trap

        public static final double trap​(double x,
                                double a,
                                double b,
                                double c,
                                double d)
        trapezoidal membership function
        Parameters:
        x - input value for which to compute membership value.
        a - defines its left foot.
        b - defines its left shoulder.
        c - defines its right shoulder.
        d - defines its right foot.
        Returns:
        membership value.

        public static final double tri​(double x,

                               double c)
        triangular membership function
        Parameters:
        x - input value for which to compute membership value.
        a - defines its left foot.
        b - defines its peak.
        c - defines its right foot.
        Returns:
        membership value.
